text: Tommy "Hurricane" Jackson (1931-1982) was an American boxer. He fought from 1951 until 1961. He had a total of 44 fights. His statistics were 34 wins (16 by knockout), 9 losses and 1 draw. He fought Floyd Patterson in June 1956 to see who would be the heavyweight champion after Rocky Marciano retired and gave up the title. Jackson lost in a 12-round split decision. He fought Patterson again in July 1957, when Patterson was the champion. Patterson beat him in 10 rounds when the referee ended the match. ==Other websites== *Photo 1 of Bob Baker vs Hurricane Jackson close fight *Photo 2 of Bob Baker vs Hurricane Jackson close fight *Story on Hurricane Jackson Category:American boxers Category:1931 births Category:1982 deaths Category:Sportspeople from Georgia (U.S. state)
title: Tommy Jackson
